name: glass-easel-template-compiler
description: The template compiler of the glass-easel project.
author: wechat-miniprogram

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target bundler && mv pkg/package.json pkg/package.json.orig && rollup -o pkg/glass_easel_template_compiler_bg.cjs.js -f cjs pkg/glass_easel_template_compiler_bg.js
